componentDescription: Renders a badge with various styles and states according to the design guidelines.

content.description: The content to be displayed within the badge.

variant.description: Determines the styling variants a UI component can have, which could include filled, outlined, or ghost styles among others.

position.description: Lists possible positions for UI elements that can be placed in one of the corners of a container, like notification badges.

size.description: Specifies available sizes for UI elements, catering to a range of scalability from extra small to extra large.

shape.description: Defines possible values for the shape of a UI component such as buttons or badges.

views.description: Describes the style properties available for badge components, where container styles the outer part and text styles the inner content.
